dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Peters (for himself and Mrs. Kiggans of Virginia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to modify the definition of short-term work for purposes of Navy construction of combatant and escort vessels and assignment of vessel projects.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Smart Ship Repair Act of 2025.

section.header: Definition of short-term work for purposes of Navy construction of combatant and escort vessels and assignment of vessel projects
section.text: Section 8669a(c)(4) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by striking 12 months and inserting 18 months.
